001package org.consensusj.bitcoinj.signing;
002
003import org.bitcoinj.base.Coin;
004import org.bitcoinj.script.Script;
005import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptBuilder;
006import org.bitcoinj.script.ScriptOpCodes;
007
008/**
009 * Raw, immutable data for an OP_RETURN transaction output
010 */
011public class TransactionOutputOpReturn implements TransactionOutputData {
012    private final byte[] opReturnData;
013
014    public TransactionOutputOpReturn(byte[] opReturnData) {
015        this.opReturnData = opReturnData;
016    }
017
018    @Override
019    public Coin amount() {
020        return Coin.ofSat(0);
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public Script scriptPubKey() {
025        return new ScriptBuilder()
026                .op(ScriptOpCodes.OP_RETURN)
027                .data(opReturnData)
028                .build();
029    }
030
031    public byte[] opReturnData() {
032        return opReturnData;
033    }
034
035}
